title: shivAya namavenrE
sahitya:
shivAya namavenrE idaiyarAc-cintanai sheivOmE sadA


anupallavi

  apAyam oru nALum illai madamanam aDanga shEra vArIr ulagIr


caraNam    alai pOlum OyAp-piRavi mAri mAri varum tunbakkaDal ninru karai EralAm
ulaga nAthan nammai ALa engum niraindirukka marandhu tuyar uzhalAmal sadA
